Description:
Monitor the creation of a new key under 'TaskCache' when a new scheduled task is registered by a process that is not svchost.exe, which is suspicious

Author: Syed Hasan (@syedhasan009)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Scheduled TaskCache Change by Uncommon Program
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\schedule\taskcache\%' and  not ((process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\dropbox\update\dropboxupdate.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\dropbox\update\dropboxupdate.exe') or (process_path like 'c:\windows\microsoft.net\framework%' and process_path like '%\ngen.exe' and (target_object like '%\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\schedule\taskcache\tasks\{b66b135d-da06-4fc4-95f8-7458e1d10129}%' or target_object like '%\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\schedule\taskcache\tree\microsoft\windows\.net framework\.net framework ngen%')) or (process_path = 'c:\program files\microsoft office\root\integration\integrator.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft office\root\integration\integrator.exe') or process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\msiexec.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\windows\explorer.exe' and target_object like '%\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\schedule\taskcache\tree\microsoft\windows\pla\server manager performance monitor\%') or process_path = 'system' or (target_object like '%microsoft\windows\updateorchestrator%' or target_object like '%microsoft\windows\softwareprotectionplatform\svcrestarttask\index%' or target_object like '%microsoft\windows\flighting\onesettings\refreshcache\index%') or (process_path like 'c:\windows\%' and process_path like '%\tiworker.exe') or process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\svchost.exe'))
